results.title: Effect of a fixed-dose combination of Telmisartan/S-amlodipine on circadian blood pressure compared with Telmisartan monotherapy: TENUVA-BP study
results.text_hl: This study evaluated the circadian efficacy of a @CHEMICAL_Telmisartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077333 @@@telmisartan@@@ 40 mg/S-@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ 2.5 mg fixed-dose combination (Telmisartan40/@CHEMICAL_Sulfur @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013455 @@@S-@@@Amlodipine2.5) compared to @CHEMICAL_Telmisartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077333 @@@telmisartan@@@ 80 mg (Telmisartan80) in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Essential_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000075222 @@@essential hypertension@@@ who did not respond to 2-4 weeks' treatment with @CHEMICAL_Telmisartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077333 @@@telmisartan@@@ 40 mg.

results.title: Effects of olmesartan and amlodipine on blood pressure, endothelial function, and vascular inflammation.
results.text_hl: METHODS: Forty-five @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ (mean age 58.5 +- 11.2 years) with uncontrolled @<m>DISEASE_Essential_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000075222 @@@essential hypertension@@@ were randomly assigned to receive @CHEMICAL_olmesartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:C437965 @@@olmesartan@@@, an angiotensin II type 1 receptor blocker (ARB) (N = 23), or @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, a calcium channel blocker (CCB) (N = 22), for 6 months.
